text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... That's intervaltraining done!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, what's next on the list?<n>C'mon, hurry up and tell
me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Working with Vodka has been more<n>straightforward than I
expected.<n>We're making good progress.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With her long strides and flexible<n>body, her future looks
promising.
choice_data_list:
All right, let's increase your load a bit more
then.

All right, let's increase your load a bit more
then.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Bring it on! I gotta show off<n>how cool I am!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Then, one day...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Oh, crap. I forgot to turn in my<n>application for the Tracen
Meet. Better<n>get that thing in quick...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Huh, ya don't know? Oh right, there<n>hasn't been one yet
since you joined<n>the academy.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
It's basically this big event that<n>happens twice a year.
Everyone signs<n>up and gets to pick the type of race<n>they
wanna run.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: We get people from all over the place<n>comin' to watch!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Plus, it's a chance for us pre-debut<n>runners to test
ourselves against<n>those who've already debuted.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
The best part of this event is that if<n>you get assigned to the
same group, it<n>doesn't matter who's debuted or<n>not—all
you gotta do is run!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Man, I can't wait! I need to make<n>sure everyone sees my
cool side!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
And y'know what, Trainer? I think<n>today's an awesome
day to get some<n>grub outside!
choice_data_list: Sure, you deserve it for working so hard!
Sure, you deserve it for working so hard!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad we're on the same page!<n>Wait right here, Imma go
get changed!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, Vodka and I head out for a<n>meal.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Daaang, I ate so much! I know I gotta<n>watch my weight, but
it's nice having<n>a cheat meal like that once in a while!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ...Huh? Whoa!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: D-do you see that super cool poster<n>over there?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looking over, I see a flashy poster<n>depicting an
Umamusume riding a big<n>motorcycle.
choice_data_list: Looks like they're showing a new movie.
Looks like they're showing a new movie.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
A movie, huh... Oh man, it'd be so cool<n>to see that huge bike
on the screen...
choice_data_list:
Since we're already here, why don't we go
watch it?

Since we're already here, why don't we go
watch it?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Wait, are you for real?! Hell yeah!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: That... was... the coolest thing I've<n>ever seen!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Didja see how close they were to the<n>ground while
roundin' those curves?<n>That was such a cool chase scene!
choice_data_list: I didn't know you were so into motorcycles.
I didn't know you were so into motorcycles.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: How could anyone not be?! Ijust can't get 'nough of the engine'sroar or the sleek body!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Y'know, my pops owns one of those<n>bad boys. When I
was little, he'd<n>always give me rides around town.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Man, now those were good times!<n>I'm telling you, big bikes
are where<n>it's at!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
That reminds me, the first time I went<n>to the Japanese
Derby, I was on the<n>back of my pops' ride.
choice_data_list:
So your dad's the one who introduced you to
racing.

So your dad's the one who introduced you to
racing.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Yep, he loves it! He'd always tell me,<n>"Vodka, those racers
are the coolest<n>of the cool."

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I didn't get it at all the first time he<n>told me. But once I saw a
race for<n>real...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: When the gates opened, I instantlygot shivers down my spine. You couldjust feel the tension in the air.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I don't think I blinked once from the<n>beginning till the end. It
was the<n>craziest thing I'd ever seen!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Every racer had these insane auras<n>that were saying stuff
like, "I won't<n>back down!" "Get outta the way!"<n>"Victory is
mine!"

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I remember screamin' my head off<n>about how cool it was
during the ride<n>home. I couldn't really see his face<n>from
the back, but I bet my pops was<n>grinnin' ear to ear.
choice_data_list:
Is that why you decided to become a racer
yourself?

Is that why you decided to become a racer
yourself?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Yup. I wanted to be just as cool as<n>those racers!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I had a blast today. Thanks for<n>lettin' me tag along
with you to the<n>movies, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but y'know that scene before the<n>climax... um, the
romantic one...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: That, well, y'know... kinda caught me<n>by surprise.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm definitely more into action. I'd<n>prefer folks comin' in
guns blazing<n>rather than that uh... k-ki...
choice_data_list: Oh, you mean the kiss scene?
Oh, you mean the kiss scene?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
D-don't just say it! Ughhh, now I'm<n>rememberin'
everything!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Agh?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: G-got a nosebleed...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It's the day after our eventful outing.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We're working our way through one<n>of our usual training
sessions when<n>another student appears.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me, Vodka! You're in Group<n>10 for the 2000-meter
turf race at the<n>Tracen Meet, right?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh, me? Yeah, what about it?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
I just wanted to check if you were<n>planning on changing
your group... You<n>still have enough time.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: What? Change? Why would I need ta<n>do that?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: What do you mean, "why"? Didn't<n>you see who's in it?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Narita Brian is in your group!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: What?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna race against Brian?!
